mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN T.ITEMCODE = #{itemcode} THEN T.ITEMCODE END) AS ITEMCODENUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN T.ITEMDESC = #{itemdesc} THEN T.ITEMDESC END) AS ITEMDESCNUM FROM PODS.TB_ODS_JCDY_SALLCRE T
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PODS.TB_ODS_JCDY_SALLCRE (SOURCECODE, ITEMCODE, ITEMDESC, BUSITYPE, BUSIDESC, CRE, MONEY, STATE) VALUES (PORTAL.SALE_TARGET_CONFIG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{itemcode}, #{itemdesc}, #{busitype}, #{busidesc}, #{cre}, #{money}, '1')
mapper.select: SELECT T.BUSITYPE,T.BUSIDESC,T.ITEMCODE,T.ITEMDESC, TO_CHAR(T.CRE, 'fm9999999999999999990.0000') AS CRE, TO_CHAR(T.MONEY, 'fm9999999999999999990.0000') AS MONEY, T.STATE,T.SOURCECODE FROM PODS.TB_ODS_JCDY_SALLCRE T WHERE t.SOURCECODE = #{sourcecode}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN T.ITEMCODE = #{itemcode} THEN T.ITEMCODE END) AS ITEMCODENUM, COUNT(CASE WHEN T.ITEMDESC = #{itemdesc} THEN T.ITEMDESC END) AS ITEMDESCNUM FROM PODS.TB_ODS_JCDY_SALLCRE T WHERE T.SOURCECODE != #{sourcecode}
